chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Bow down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.
items.plainText: Bow down thine ear, O LORD, hear me: for I am poor and needy.

items.text: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.
items.plainText: Preserve my soul; for I am holy: O thou my God, save thy servant that trusteth in thee.

items.text: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.
items.plainText: Be merciful unto me, O Lord: for I cry unto thee daily.

items.text: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.
items.plainText: Rejoice the soul of thy servant: for unto thee, O Lord, do I lift up my soul.

items.text: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.
items.plainText: For thou, Lord, art good, and ready to forgive; and plenteous in mercy unto all them that call upon thee.

items.text: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.
items.plainText: Give ear, O LORD, unto my prayer; and attend to the voice of my supplications.

items.text: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.
items.plainText: In the day of my trouble I will call upon thee: for thou wilt answer me.

items.text: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.
items.plainText: Among the gods there is none like unto thee, O Lord; neither are there any works like unto thy works.

items.text: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.
items.plainText: All nations whom thou hast made shall come and worship before thee, O Lord; and shall glorify thy name.

items.text: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.
items.plainText: For thou art great, and doest wondrous things: thou art God alone.

items.text: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.
items.plainText: Teach me thy way, O LORD; I will walk in thy truth: unite my heart to fear thy name.

items.text: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.
items.plainText: I will praise thee, O Lord my God, with all my heart: and I will glorify thy name for evermore.

items.text: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.
items.plainText: For great is thy mercy toward me: and thou hast delivered my soul from the lowest hell.

items.text: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.
items.plainText: O God, the proud are risen against me, and the assemblies of violent men have sought after my soul; and have not set thee before them.

items.text: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.
items.plainText: But thou, O Lord, art a God full of compassion, and gracious, longsuffering, and plenteous in mercy and truth.

items.text: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.
items.plainText: O turn unto me, and have mercy upon me; give thy strength unto thy servant, and save the son of thine handmaid.

items.text: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, LORD, hast holpen me, and comforted me.
items.plainText: Shew me a token for good; that they which hate me may see it, and be ashamed: because thou, LORD, hast holpen me, and comforted me.
